name: Ghost Rush (Shoemaker's Last Software)
description:
Shoemaker's Last proudly presents:  Ghost Rush!

Game play is deceptively simple. You control a ghost that is in constant motion along a circular path.  The left joystick button is the only control.  Press it to change directions. Collect the  dots for points... but avoid the falling enemies coming at you from the top, and later from the sides!

Ghost Rush runs on a 64K CoCo 1 or 2, or a CoCo 3. On a CoCo 3 only, pressing [P] on the title screen will cycle through different color sets for both RGB and composite monitors.

The game is in 100% machine language using a 128x96 hires graphics mode in either 4 or 16 colors.

Many thanks to Steve Bjork for sharing his random number generator routine, and to Rick Adams for sharing his 4-voice music routine.

There are three versions of the game on the virtual disk:

  1. GR16.BIN runs in 16 colors on a CoCo 3 only
  2. GR.BIN runs in 4 colors using the standard CoCo color palette (grn/ylw/blu/red) on a CoCo 1, 2 or 3.  

After downloading from the link below, insert or mount the disk.  Next, LOADM the desired version and type EXEC to start!
